annotations.description: A classic alternative to traditional Absinthe service The Absinthe Frappe was purportedly created by a bartender named Cayetano Ferrer at The Old Absinthe Ho...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Absinthe Frappe

textContent:
1.5 oz. absinthe
.5 oz. simple syrup (1:1)
2 oz. soda water
8 mint leaves
1 lemon wedge

Muddle lemon and mint in tin. 
Shake and pour. 
Top with soda water.  

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gKX3udyGa5Y
title: Absinthe Frappe
